LanguageData.IncidentTweakerChanceExplanation: Base chance of the event to happen with multiplier applied.\nThe green bar shows the likelihood of the incident happening relative to other incidents in the same category.
LanguageData.IncidentTweakerNotApplicableDesc: Base chance for the incident is 0, so its probability is determinerd by the game in some other way. Tweaking the probability may have no effect.
